thread.title: Credit card data breach hits Trump Hotels, media reports say
thread.title_full: Credit card data breach hits Trump Hotels, media reports say

author: Emon Reiser
title: Credit card data breach hits Trump Hotels, media reports say
text:
Credit card data breach hits Trump Hotels, media reports say Jul 2, 2015, 12:24pm EDT Mark Freerks Donald Trump. The Trump Hotel Collection affiliated with celebrity investor and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has confirmed a credit card data breach dating back to February 2015, several news outlets are reporting. In addition to the Trump National Doral in Miami, the luxury hotel chain has locations in Honolulu, Chicago, Las Vegas, Los Angeles and New York. KrebsOnSecurity.com was the first to report the breach , which has since been confirmed by Consumerist.com . Related Content According to Krebs, the breach was confirmed by "sources at several banks who traced a pattern of fraudulent debit and credit card charges to accounts that had all been used at Trump hotels." Donald Trump has been making headlines this week for racist comments against Mexican immigrants and suing Univision. The South Florida Business Journal has reached out to both Trump National Doral and Trump Hotels for comment, but has not yet received a response.
